alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 29 at 9:40PM CDT until March 30 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...West Cameron and East Cameron Parishes. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 5 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Inundation levels of 1.0 to 1.5 feet above astronomical tide levels.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
